ModMetaData.name: Reinforced Walls Renewed
ModMetaData.author: Aleph
ModMetaData.description:
Renewed version of 'Reinforced Walls' mod by Neceros The original mod is no longer supported by Neceros. This version works better with new versions of the game: wall mounted lamps added in the 1.5 update can be placed on the walls (as well as wall attachable objects added by other mods) Please note that wall attachable objects cannot be placed on embrasures Unlike some other 'Reinforced walls' versions, Renewed doesn`t require any other mods to work properly.
Adds expensive heavy reinforced walls with exceptional hit points that resists explosive damage. Additionally, you get an embrasure version of the heavy reinforced wall (you can shoot through it, but not walk through it) providing 65% cover from fire (as it really was in Neceros mod). Works with all stone and metal materials (even modded) Research one industrial project to gain access. Add to a save just fine. Remove it from a save easy too, just remove the walls first.
